verses.verse: When I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2596>with<s%> <S%G5247>excellence<s%> of <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G2605>proclaiming<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

We <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G1161>however,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are full <S%G5046>grown;<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> a <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of the <S%G758>rulers<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are coming to <S%G2673>nothing.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> the wisdom that has been <S%G613>hidden,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4309>foreordained<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G165>worlds<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%>

<S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of the <S%G758>rulers<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> has <S%G1097>known.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>had<s%> they <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G4717>it,<s%> they wouldn't <S%G3756><s%> <S%G302>have<s%> <S%G4717>crucified<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "Things which <S%G3739>an<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1492>see,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756><s%> an <S%G3775>ear<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2532>which<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G305>enter<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> these <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> to <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> them <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2045>searches<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2532>yes,<s%> the deep <S%G899>things<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> among <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1487>except<s%> <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of the <S%G444>man,<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him?<s%> <S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so,<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1487>except<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2983>received,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we might <S%G1492>know<s%> the things <S%G3588>that<s%> were freely <S%G5483>given<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Which <S%G3739>things<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> which <S%G442>man<s%>'s <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1318>teaches,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1318>teaches,<s%> <S%G4793>comparing<s%> spiritual <S%G4152>things<s%> with spiritual <S%G4152>things.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G5591>natural<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>he<s%> <S%G1410>can't<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>them,<s%> because they are <S%G4153>spiritually<s%> <S%G350>discerned.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G4152%G99999>spiritual<s%> <S%G350>discerns<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> is <S%G350>judged<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> no <S%G3762>one.<s%>

<S%G1063>"For<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he should <S%G4822>instruct<s%> <S%G846>him?<s%>" <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s <S%G3563>mind.<s%>
